'''v0.13.0 alpha build 3'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2015/11/0130-build-3.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: Changelog for 0.13 build 3!|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref> is the third build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.13.0 alpha|v0.13.0]].

== Changes ==
* [[Boat]]s now stack on top of each other
* [[Beetroot soup]] now stacks
* Improved curved rail and redstone behavior
* Improved [[slime]] spawning
* Redstone ticks are more frequent

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash when covering an XOR Gate
* Fixed [[mushroom stew]] applying poison
* Smelting progress bar resets correctly
* Fixed [[clay]] generating in place of [[gravel]]
* Fixed [[stone slab]] side texture
* Fixed mobs staying aggressive towards the player when switching to Creative
* Fixed colors not functioning in the chat
* Fixed disappearing parts of [[iron golem]]s, [[villager]]s, [[endermen]] and [[wolf|wolves]]
* Fixed [[note block]]s not being powered
* [[Boat]]s no longer cause holes when rendering behind waterfalls
* Fixed missed faces in water rendering</onlyinclude>
